summary:
With over 19 years of IT technical and ERP release management experience to back me, I understand the needs and expectations of IT industry. Over the course of my career I’ve worked with clear, logical mind with a practical approach to problem solving and a drive to see things through to completion. 

  I’m specialized in large scale project coordination, release management and integration designing. I have worked in many global projects and worked with individuals / teams located in many different parts of the world, and rallied them as one unit to achieve common goals.
